Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-66293 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.52-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-66293 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.52-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libpng is earlier than 1.6.52-1, affected by CVE-2025-66293
